name: EUR/ACE National Endowment for Democracy Small Grants
popular_name: National Endowment for Democracy (NED) Small Grants Program in Europe, Eurasia and Central Asia
objective: To advance democracy in Europe, Eurasia and Central Asia by providing support to indigenous civil society organizations.
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: 634A, Foreign Assistance Act of 1961. 75 Stat. 424. Pub. L. 87, 194. 22 U.S.C. § 2151.
Department of State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Appropriations Act of 2010. Pub. L. 111, 117.
